alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Marion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:34AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bradley, southeastern Marion and Hamilton Counties through 615 AM EDT/515 AM CDT/... At 534 AM EDT/434 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chattanooga, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Soddy-Daisy, Signal Mountain, Rossville, Walden, Lakesite, Charleston, Ridgeside and South Cleveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
